title: [GOLD-PLAT] [FLEX5s] Looking to form a new team
body:
Hey folks,


we are planing to start a new team. We are not going to be the most tryhard team in the sense that we dont:

- have fixed playing times (we just play when everyone has time, neeeeeerds)

- fixed tournament days


But we are very focused on improving as a team (even more than on winning) in terms of playing certain compositions, executing a game plan and communication. You should be able to step outside of your comfort zone, e.g. by playing a champion you dont have much practice on but it's necessary for the team comp (feeding allowed). You should also not be one-tricking a champion.




Position|Taken|Solo/Duo|Flex

Top|-|-|

Jungle|X|Plat3|Gold3

Mid|X|Plat4|Gold1

Bot|-|-|

Support|-|-|




Last updated: Jan 2nd



We are looking preferably for a duo botlane because there (should) be already some synergy.

Please dont be that guy that plays one game with us and then never again :)



IGN: Midlane Moshpit



Edit: Teamspeak3 is a requirement
